overview: Ayef meets Manny. It is at a time where she focuses on her dreams while Manny being a flighty young shop owner, goes with the flow. They both believe love is inconvenient and agree to a contractual fling expiring on the date Ayef leaves for Singapore, but they start falling for one another.

title: An Inconvenient Love
